3a) -3
k1=00001011 00000010 01100111 10011011 01001001 10100101

3b)-5
L0=11001100000000001100110011111111 R0=11110000101010101111000010101010
E[R0]=011110 100001 010101 010101 011110 100001 010101 010101

3c)-5
L1=R0=11110000101010101111000010101010
and R1=01011110000111001110110001100011 <= L0+f(R0,k1)

4) -3

two blocks after that block will be corrupted.
